channel.title: Evergreen on Both Are True
channel.description: Recent content in Evergreen on Both Are True

item.title: Inspirations
item.description:
As I venture forth into this new wilderness, I find myself returning again and again to influences and inspirations.

Specifically, I want to write them down, for myself, and share them, for y’all. It’s way too easy to forget about them in the maelstrom of the day, the hubbub of the night.

So, in no particular order, here are some people whose work inspires me and to whom I look when thinking about this next chapter:

item.title: Links
item.description:
Inspired by this I am starting a links page.

What will I put here is to be determined of course.

Update (09-20-25): I need multiple link pages. One is probably best for self-promo and BAT-promo.

item.title: People Who Seem Awesome That I'd Love to Work With
item.description: https://sundogcowboy.com/ - Jess Hererra who designed Cody Cook-Parrott’s website which seems awesome
